products.name: Yakety Yak
products.details: Hot new hit of the summer!

reviews.title: Great Song
reviews.content: I could listen to this record all day.

products.name: Toastmate 2000
products.details: Get the taste back into your toast, and forget the past this is your future!

reviews.title: Husband Happy
reviews.content: Say this machine has some shine!

products.name: Dinner Set
products.details: The dinnerware so strong it requires a vibranium head to shatter.

reviews.title: My wife..
reviews.content: Threw this at my head accidentally and it shattered!

products.name: Parcheesi
products.details: The classic game of chase, race, and capture.

reviews.title: Guests not Interested
reviews.content: Not a good game to recommend if your guests haven't eaten.

products.name: Helicopter
products.details: The toy that sometimes ends up in your neighbors lawn.

reviews.title: Color?
reviews.content: My world is black and white, this shouldn't be in color.

products.name: Radio
products.details: Listen to the tunes of the 60s like, 'Help Me Rhonda', on your new radio, now with self tuning.

reviews.title: Voices
reviews.content: I think my radio is haunted I keep hearing voices, songs sound great though.

products.name: Big Red Gum
products.details: Kiss a little longer with Big Red!

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.content: Don't give this to folks without a stomach.

products.name: Strucker
products.details: A watch so he'll make time for you.

reviews.title: Good Pairing
reviews.content: Looked good next to my lady with my strucker watch on!

products.name: Macrame
products.details: Life got you in knots? Try macrame! The relaxing knot tying craft to get you through any day.

reviews.title: Doesn't Hitch Itself
reviews.content: I was hoping this product would craft for me.

products.name: Hydrasoak
products.details: When you want to get away, but don't want to go anywhere.

reviews.title: Found the Goddess Within
reviews.content: This stuff works wonders, so stress relieving.

products.name: Schwinn Tandem
products.details: A bike designed so you never lose your loved one again.

reviews.title: No Control
reviews.content: My wife seems to have total control over where we go, I think I need my old bike back.

products.name: Electrolux
products.details: The vacuum that practically cleans for you!

reviews.title: Amazing Product
reviews.content: I barely have to lift a finger to use this!

products.name: The Descent of Man
products.details: Thrilling novel about natural selection. Written by Charles Darwin.

reviews.title: Adults Only
reviews.content: Started reading it to my child and he started crying.

products.name: Lagos Paper Towels
products.details: The most absorbant paper towel available. For when you make a mess you didn't mean to.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.content: This product is amazing, and my husband can use it too!

products.name: Azalea Bush
products.details: A perfect addition to any garden! Comes in a variety of colors.

reviews.title: Not Pet Friendly
reviews.content: Watch out, these killed my neighbors dog when he ate them.

products.name: Rubix Cube
products.details: A new puzzle with over 3 billion combinations, but just one solution!

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.content: I couldn't put this product down for hours, still haven't solved it.

products.name: Dance Dance Revolution
products.details: The new game for playstation 2. Have the hotest club in the city, in your living room!

reviews.title: Warning
reviews.content: Do not play with dorky siblings, they won't be any competition.

products.name: Silly string
products.details: Amazing, plastic string in a can!

reviews.title: What a Mess
reviews.content: So hard to clean up after my kids have used this.

products.name: Yo Magic
products.details: Have time to hang fin with Yo Magic. The snack for survivors!

reviews.title: Bad Lid
reviews.content: Couldn't get the lid opened.

products.name: Sokovian Fortune Teller Costume
products.details: The best new costume of the decade! Tell your friends fortunes in this Sokovian gem!

reviews.title: Looks familiar...
reviews.content: I think they've stolen this look from somewhere but I can't remember where.

products.name: Case of Mondays Crew Neck
products.details: 100% cotton crew neck for the days when nothing seems to go right.

reviews.title: Great Fit
reviews.content: I love this sweatshirt, I wear it almost everyday!

products.name: Nexus Anti-depressant
products.details: Ask you doctor about nexus, a unique antidepressant. Because the world doesn't revolve around you, or does it?

reviews.title: Side Effects
reviews.content: Be careful, I experienced feeling my feelings, confronting my truth, and more depression.

products.name: Dark Hold
products.details: The best late night read for those who can't seem to shake a dream.

reviews.title: Price Lied
reviews.content: They said the product was one dollar but I clearly had to sell my soul!

products.name: Flannel Robe
products.details: A cozy robe to wear on days when you just feel 'fine'.

reviews.title: So COZY
reviews.content: Helps me get through my rainy days.
